00041 MasterClient::MasterClient(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr,
00042     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00043     ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue)
00044   : m_verbose(true), m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_mgr),
00045     m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue),
00046     m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_initiated(false) {
00047 
00048   m_comm = m_conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00049   memset(&m_master_addr, 0, sizeof(m_master_addr));
00050 
00054   m_master_file_callback_ptr = new MasterFileHandler(this, m_app_queue_ptr);
00055   m_master_file_handle = 0;
00056   try {
00057     Timer timer(timeout_ms, true);
00058     m_master_file_handle = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/master",
00059                     OPEN_FLAG_READ, m_master_file_callback_ptr, &timer);
00060   }
00061   catch (Exception &e) {
00062     if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND && e.code()
00063         != Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00064       HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, e.what());
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 MasterClient::~MasterClient() {
00070   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(m_master_file_handle);
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 void MasterClient::initiate_connection(DispatchHandlerPtr dhp) {
00075   m_dispatcher_handler_ptr = dhp;
00076   if (m_master_file_handle == 0)
00077     HT_THROW(Error::MASTER_NOT_RUNNING,
00078              "MasterClient unable to connect to Master");
00079   reload_master();
00080 }

00083 void
00084 MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr,
00085                            DispatchHandler *handler, Timer *timer) {
00086   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename,
00087                                                              schemastr));
00088   send_message(cbp, handler, timer);
00089 }

00091 
00092 void
00093 MasterClient::create_table(const char *tablename, const char *schemastr,
00094                            Timer *timer) {
00095   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00096   EventPtr event_ptr;
00097   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_create_table_request(tablename,
00098                                                              schemastr));
00099 
00100   send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00101 
00102   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00103     HT_THROWF(MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00104               "Master 'create table' error, tablename=%s", tablename);
00105 }

00139 
00140 void
00141 MasterClient::get_schema(const char *tablename, std::string &schema,
00142                          Timer *timer) {
00143   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00144   EventPtr event_ptr;
00145   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_get_schema_request(tablename));
00146   send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00147   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00148     HT_THROWF(MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00149               "Master 'get schema' error, tablename=%s", tablename);
00150   }
00151   else {
00152     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00153     size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00154     schema = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00155   }
00156 
00157 }

00160 void MasterClient::status(Timer *timer) {
00161   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00162   EventPtr event_ptr;
00163   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_status_request());
00164 
00165   send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00166 
00167   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00168     HT_THROW(MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00169              "Master 'status' error");
00170 
00171 }

00206 void
00207 MasterClient::report_split(TableIdentifier *table, RangeSpec &range,
00208     const char *log_dir, uint64_t soft_limit, Timer *timer) {
00209   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00210   EventPtr event_ptr;
00211   CommBufPtr cbp(MasterProtocol::create_report_split_request(table, range,
00212                  log_dir, soft_limit));
00213 
00214   send_message(cbp, &sync_handler, timer);
00215 
00216   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00217     HT_THROWF(MasterProtocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00218               "Master 'report split' error %s[%s..%s]",
00219               table->name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00220 
00221 }

00259 
00260 void
00261 MasterClient::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbp, DispatchHandler *handler,
00262                            Timer *timer) {
00263   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00264   int error;
00265   uint32_t timeout_ms = timer ? timer->remaining() : m_timeout_ms;
00266 
00267   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, timeout_ms, cbp, handler))
00268       != Error::OK)
00269     HT_THROWF(error, "MasterClient send request to %s failed",
00270               m_master_addr.format().c_str());
00271 
00272 }
00273 
00274 
00275 void MasterClient::reload_master() {
00276   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00277   int error;
00278   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00279   String addr_str;
00280 
00281   m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(m_master_file_handle, "address", value);
00282 
00283   addr_str = (const char *)value.base;
00284 
00285   if (addr_str != m_master_addr_string) {
00286 
00287     if (m_master_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00288       if ((error = m_conn_manager_ptr->remove(m_master_addr)) != Error::OK) {
00289         if (m_verbose)
00290           HT_WARNF("Problem removing connection to Master - %s",
00291                    Error::get_text(error));
00292       }
00293       if (m_verbose)
00294         HT_INFOF("Connecting to new Master (old=%s, new=%s)",
00295                  m_master_addr_string.c_str(), addr_str.c_str());
00296     }
00297 
00298     m_master_addr_string = addr_str;
00299 
00300     InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, m_master_addr_string.c_str());
00301 
00302     m_conn_manager_ptr->add(m_master_addr, 15000, "Master",
00303                             m_dispatcher_handler_ptr);
00304   }
00305 
00306 }

00309 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00310   return m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_master_addr, max_wait_ms);
00311 }

00313 bool MasterClient::wait_for_connection(Timer &timer) {
00314   return m_conn_manager_ptr->wait_for_connection(m_master_addr, timer);
